name: Pipe Dream! - Free Puzzle Game with Pipes to keep Your Brain Busy and Stimulated
name_original: Pipe Dream! - Free Puzzle Game with Pipes to keep Your Brain Busy and Stimulated
description:
This game is a free edition of Pipe Dream! For the full version, just search for Pipe Dream! in the App Store.

Ready! Set! Go! Arrange the pipes as fast as you can to line up the top pipe to the bottom pipe. Warning!!! Pipe Dream is a clever, quick witted game that may cause you to become overly attached to playing.

Not a lot of time to play? That's okay. Pipe Dream is a fast, fun game which can be played just about anywhere. This amusing game is not only fun, it is a highly entertaining game of strategy. Rapidly tap the screen to rotate the pipes and be sure the pipe is connected all the way from the top to the bottom. Check to be sure you have it put together correctly. Then turn the valve and watch as animated water flows smoothly down the pipes.

Did you spill the water? Don't worry! You can always retry the level. But hurry! You're being timed! Can you beat your own time? Pipe Dream has 48 mind blowing levels which will keep you engaged for hours of fun.

Pipe Dream is the ideal game for people of all ages. Children, teens and adults have all come to love playing this incredible game. Did you know that Pipe Dream is a great game for developing Visual Spatial skills?

Visual Spatial skills are the ability to look at shapes, designs or devices and logically decide how to manipulate, or use, that device in the best possible way.
